function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of SARS-CoV-2 transmission through air and HVAC systems","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in built environments","Mitigation":"Further studies to determine the transmission and implement necessary precautions","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, HVAC system manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inconsistent guidelines for air-conditioning system operation","Impact":"Confusion and uncertainty in implementing effective measures","Mitigation":"Establish consensus among guidelines and prioritize scientific evidence","Technologies":"Monitoring and control systems for temperature, humidity, and ventilation","People":"Building managers, HVAC system operators, public health officials","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
